subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Coaches and Managers
Sex Crimes
Athletics and Sports
organizations: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
lead_paragraph: A panel discussion about young athletes who have been sexually assaulted or abused by their coaches was part of the MaleSurvivor 13th International Conference at John Jay College of Criminal Justice.
snippet: A panel discussion about young athletes who have been sexually assaulted or abused by their coaches was part of the MaleSurvivor 13th International Conference at John Jay College of Criminal Justice.
